Name: SOK MIN
About the game: SOK MIN is a sokoban classic puzzle game, the sequel of the SOK puzzle. This game contains only the smallest and the easiest levels in the history of SOK puzzles. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. Now it's easier than ever. Perhaps, you do not need a guide for completing each level. Just push the boxes! ■ Fascinating gameplay; ■ 100 awesome and small levels; ■ No background music, just You and the Game; ■ 103 beautiful achievements; ■ Cloud Saves; ■ Trading cards, backgrounds & emoticons: will be added as soon as it becomes available, according to the rules of Steam.
